home.description: I build modern, high-performance web experiences with Next.js, React and TypeScript. Passionate about clean code and elegant user interfaces.
home.finalCtaText: Have a project in mind? I'd love to discuss how I can help bring it to life.

about.title: About me
about.bio1: Hello! I'm Essoungou Ndemba François-Philippe, a full-stack developer passionate about building modern and high-performance web experiences.
about.bio2: With several years of experience in web development, I specialize in the React/Next.js ecosystem and modern technologies. I love turning complex ideas into elegant, intuitive solutions.
about.bio3: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.
